attributes.action: Syrian Unrest - The UK Should Take An Active Part In Stopping The Genocide
attributes.additional_details:
I believe the current Syrian government is corrupt and guilty of killing innocent people to further its own ends.

I would like to see the UK government adopt a firmer stance, both within Parliament and the UN, to prevent further atrocities against the civilian population.

Possible actions are many and varied, but should commence immediately with a debate in the House(s)
